* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").

| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [EvilHack 0.8.2 - monst.c, line 2828](https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/blob/v0.8.2/src/monst.c#L2828)                                                                 |

A **drow zombie**, Z, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). It is a [zombified](/wiki/Zombie_\(EvilHack\) "Zombie (EvilHack)") form of [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)") that behaves the same as zombies of other species.

A drow zombie has a [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") claw attack that drains [constitution](/wiki/Constitution "Constitution") and a brain-eating bite attack that can cause a zombifying [illness](/wiki/Illness "Illness"). Drow zombies possess [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance"), [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance"), [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance"), and a [vulnerability](/wiki/Vulnerability "Vulnerability") to [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire").

## Generation

Randomly generated drow zombies are always created hostile, and may appear in small [groups](/wiki/Group "Group").

A drow zombie may [revive](/wiki/Revive "Revive") after being destroyed if it leaves a [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse").

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") characters and monsters killed by zombies or their infection will arise as a drow zombie.

## Encyclopedia entry

Drow, also known as dark elves, deep elves, night elves, and  
the Dark Ones among orcs, are a dark-skinned sub-race of elves  
that predominantly live in the Underdark. They are hated and  
feared due to their cruelty, though some non-evil and an even  
smaller number of good drow exist.  
  
"Station: In all the world of the drow, there is no more  
important word. It is the calling of their - of our - religion,  
the incessant pulling of hungering heartstrings. Ambition  
overrides good sense and compassion is thrown away in its face,  
all in the name of Lloth, the Spider Queen." - Drizzt Do'Urden  
  
\[ Homeland, by R.A. Salvatore ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Drow_zombie_\(EvilHack\)\&action=edit)*

html:
Drow zombie (EvilHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Z drow zombie (No tile)
Difficulty 4
Attacks Claw 1d7 poisonous (constitution), Bite 1d2 intelligence drain
Z drow zombie (No tile)
Difficulty 4
Attacks

Claw 1d7 poisonous (constitution), Bite 1d2 intelligence drain

Base level 3
Base experience 16
Speed 3
Base AC 9
Base MR 0
Alignment -3 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 800
Nutritional value 175
Size Medium
Resistances cold,sleep,poison,level drain
Resistances conveyed None

A drow zombie:

  • does not breathe.
  • is mindless.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • has infravision.
  • normally appears in small groups.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference EvilHack 0.8.2 - monst.c, line 2828

A drow zombie, Z, is a type of monster that appears in EvilHack. It is a zombified form of drow that behaves the same as zombies of other species.

A drow zombie has a poisonous claw attack that drains constitution and a brain-eating bite attack that can cause a zombifying illness. Drow zombies possess cold resistance, sleep resistance, poison resistance, drain resistance, and a vulnerability to fire.

Generation

Randomly generated drow zombies are always created hostile, and may appear in small groups.

A drow zombie may revive after being destroyed if it leaves a corpse.

Drow characters and monsters killed by zombies or their infection will arise as a drow zombie.

Encyclopedia entry

Drow, also known as dark elves, deep elves, night elves, and
the Dark Ones among orcs, are a dark-skinned sub-race of elves
that predominantly live in the Underdark. They are hated and
feared due to their cruelty, though some non-evil and an even
smaller number of good drow exist.

"Station: In all the world of the drow, there is no more
important word. It is the calling of their - of our - religion,
the incessant pulling of hungering heartstrings. Ambition
overrides good sense and compassion is thrown away in its face,
all in the name of Lloth, the Spider Queen." - Drizzt Do'Urden

[ Homeland, by R.A. Salvatore ]

A '''drow zombie''', {{black|Z}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[EvilHack]]. It is a [[Zombie (EvilHack)|zombified]] form of [[Drow (monster attribute)|drow]] that behaves the same as zombies of other species.

A drow zombie has a [[poisonous]] claw attack that drains [[constitution]] and a brain-eating bite attack that can cause a zombifying [[illness]]. Drow zombies possess [[cold resistance]], [[sleep resistance]], [[poison resistance]], [[drain resistance]], and a [[vulnerability]] to [[fire]].

==Generation==
Randomly generated drow zombies are always created hostile, and may appear in small [[group]]s.

A drow zombie may [[revive]] after being destroyed if it leaves a [[corpse]].

[[Drow (starting race)|Drow]] characters and monsters killed by zombies or their infection will arise as a drow zombie.
